metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian4 from the Heapside Kitchen Helper Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the female human civilian4 behind the backdoor of the Elfsong tavern's kitchen.

0.speaker: Tooralooralayo
0.text: This one's got a heart of gold - I don't know what we'd do without him.

1.speaker: Tooralooralayo
1.text: I just hope he doesn't get in trouble for giving us this stuff. But sure it's going to waste anyway...
